section.name: SheetName
section.p: The type of object currently being edited is displayed at the top of the [b]Properties[/b] panel.

section.name: Permutation
section.p: Fields that support [b]Permutations[/b] will have a ticket icon above them that be clicked to view and edit permutations.

section.name: PropertyName
section.p: Fields are display with the name of the field above the widget for editing them.
A [color=LimeGreen]green[/color] name means that the field has a value different then the default value.

section.name: Colors
section.p: Color fields have a bar beneath them that displays the color.
[b]Click[/b] on the bar to open a color picker to select the color to use.

section.name: GradientHandle
section.p: When editing gradients you can [b]CTRL + CLICK[/b] to insert new gradient stops.
[b]Double click[/b] the stop to edit the color for it.
Gradient stops can be removed by [b]CTRL + CLICK[/b]ing on them again.

section.name: CurveChannel
section.p: Selecting which channel of [i]Color Curves[/i] to edit is done here.
If the channel is set to [b]All[/b] then it will replace the existing values in other channels.

section.name: CurveHandles
section.p: Curve handles can be inserted in the curves plot with [b]CTRL + CLICK[/b]
Curve handles can be removed by [b]CTRL + CLICK[/b]ing on them again.

section.name: CurveLinear
section.p: The [i]Make Linear[/i] command resets the curve to a linear one.

section.name: CurveMatch
section.p: The [i]Curve Match[/i] command will set the curves of [b]ALL[/b] other channels to match the current curve.
